subject: Re: re : [junit] Re: cannot run testing with UI TestRunner?
msgSnippet: ... I am having the same problem trying to test an ejb using jboss 2.1 on linux with jdk 1.3. My classpath ...
messageBody:
tammo.freese@... wrote:

> --- In junit@y..., <tsmets@a...> wrote:
>
>> The reason of the error is unknown to me also but it needed to be
>
> specified in the -noloading <argument> as the property file was not
> sufficient to avoid the Exception.
>
> This is strange ?!
>
>
>> I cannot workout the origin of the problem...
>> If some Sun Engineer could give me some info over teh origin of the
>
> matter I would appreciate !
>
> Well, I am no Sun Engineer.
> But would you be so nice to repeat your problem?
>
> If it is the same problem that you want to exclude some
> packages from being reloaded (there are problems with
> jar and zip files):
>
> (What version of junit are you using?)
>
> 1) Have you put the excluded.properties file in a directory
> <DUMMY>/junit/util ?
> 2) Have you added <DUMMY> to your classpath
> BEFORE anything else?
>
> -
> Tammo Freese
> freese@...
>
>
I am having the same problem trying to test an ejb using jboss 2.1 on linux with jdk 1.3.

My classpath
/usr/local/jars:/usr/local/jars/junit.jar:/usr/j2sdk1.3.0/jre/lib/rt.jar:.:/usr/local/jars/rns.jar:
:/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/connector.jar:/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/deploy.jar:
/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/ejb.jar:/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/jaas.jar:
/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/jboss-client.jar:/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/jndi.jar:
/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/jnp-client.jar:/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/jta-spec1_0_1.jar:
/usr/local/jboss_jetty/jboss-PRE-2.1/client/stop.jar

In /usr/local/jars I have a directory
junit/util with excluded.properties
excluded.0=sun.*
excluded.1=com.sun.*
excluded.2=org.omg.*
excluded.3=javax.*
excluded.4=sunw.*

My tests

java junit.textui.TestRunner com.candata.Import.base.tests.LoginSessionTest
..
Time: 0.888

OK (2 tests)

java junit.swingui.TestRunner com.candata.Import.base.tests.LoginSessionTest

java.lang.ClassCastException
at com.sun.corba.se.internal.javax.rmi.PortableRemoteObject.narrow (PortableRemoteObject.java:296)
at javax.rmi.PortableRemoteObject.narrow(PortableRemoteObject.java:137)
at com.candata.Import.base.tests.LoginSessionTest.getLoginSession(LoginSessionTest.java)
at com.candata.Import.base.tests.LoginSessionTest.testgetUser(LoginSessionTest.java)

Even if I try

java junit.swingui.TestRunner -noloader com.candata.Import.base.tests.LoginSessionTest

I still get the same problem.

What am I doing wrong?

Dave
